values: Paedocommunion and Paedobaptism in the CREC | Geoff Shaw

Pastor Jeffery talks with Pastor Shaw about recent discussions within the CREC on the subject of sacramental cooperation. They discuss the historical background of the CREC; the decisions made at the recent CREC Council meeting; the important theological issues at stake; the implications for baptist and non-paedocommunion churches inside (and outside) the CREC; the impact [â€¦]
